title: Levi's
description:
The original blue jeans are synonymous with the Leviâ€™s brand, the most recognized denim makers in the world. Their recent collection of Commuter jeans caters specifically to the lifestyle of cyclist who require more needs than an average wearer.

Targeting both male and females between 25-35, the campaign execution tells the story of the commuter enhanced and liberated by the latest textile technology made for urban riding.

My role: Art Direction and design.
